name: Athletics
description: A collection of sporting events that involve competitive running, jumping, throwing, and walking.

name: Badminton
description: A racket sport played using rackets to hit a shuttlecock across a net.

name: Boxing
description: A combat sport in which two people throw punches at each other for a predetermined amount of time in a boxing ring.

name: Swimming
description: An individual or team racing sport that requires the use of one's entire body to move through water.

name: Wrestling
description: A combat sport involving grappling techniques such as clinch fighting, throws, and takedowns.

name: Fencing
description: A sport in which two competitors fight using swords, including the foil, épée, and sabre.
